name: Aqua Voice
headline: Voice-only text editor
description: Aqua is a voice-driven text editor. It lets you speak naturally, like to a person, and writes down what you meant in the format you want.

founders.name: Jack McIntire, Founder
founders.description: CTO @ Aqua Voice / prev. Arcturus Intelligence / Harvard dropout

raw_markdown='[![Aqua Voice Logo](https://withaqua.com/images/Orb-128.png)](https://withaqua.com/</>)[Blog](https://withaqua.com/</blog>)[Team](https://withaqua.com/</team>)[Web App](https://withaqua.com/</home>)
[![Apple Logo](https://withaqua.com/_next/image?url=%2Fimages%2Fwindows.png&w=32&q=75)Download](https://withaqua.com/<https:/aqua-desktop-builds.s3.us-east-1.amazonaws.com/aqua-voice-updates/win32/x64/Aqua+Voice-0.1.64+Setup.exe>)
# AI-Native Dictation
effortless formatting, subtle cleanups, 99.1 % out-of-the-box accuracy
![windows](https://withaqua.com/_next/image?url=%2Fimages%2Fwindows.png&w=48&q=75)Download for Windows
[Download for Mac ‚Üí](https://withaqua.com/<https:/aqua-desktop-builds.s3.us-east-1.amazonaws.com/aqua-voice-updates/darwin/arm64/Aqua+Voice-0.1.64-arm64.dmg>)
Trusted by individuals at
![Logo 1](https://withaqua.com/_next/image?url=%2Fimages%2FFrame%209537.png&w=828&q=75)
![Logo 2](https://withaqua.com/_next/image?url=%2Fimages%2FFrame%209538.png&w=828&q=75)
![Logo 3](https://withaqua.com/_next/image?url=%2Fimages%2FFrame%209539.png&w=828&q=75)
![Logo 4](https://withaqua.com/_next/image?url=%2Fimages%2FFrame%209540.png&w=828&q=75)
![Logo 5](https://withaqua.com/_next/image?url=%2Fimages%2FFrame%209541.png&w=828&q=75)
![Logo 6](https://withaqua.com/_next/image?url=%2Fimages%2FFrame%209542.png&w=828&q=75)
## How it works
Talk normally (you can stumble or repeat yourself)
Aqua creates the best email.
## Works in all your apps
Aqua meets you where you work.
![slack](https://withaqua.com/_next/image?url=%2Fimages%2Fapps%2Fslack.png&w=256&q=75)
![chatgpt](https://withaqua.com/_next/image?url=%2Fimages%2Fapps%2Fchatgpt.png&w=256&q=75)
![notion](https://withaqua.com/_next/image?url=%2Fimages%2Fapps%2Fnotion.png&w=256&q=75)
![chrome](https://withaqua.com/_next/image?url=%2Fimages%2Fapps%2Fchrome.png&w=256&q=75)
![discord](https://withaqua.com/_next/image?url=%2Fimages%2Fapps%2Fdiscord.png&w=256&q=75)
## Fast and _Accurate_
Aqua makes ~17x fewer mistakes than Siri and Google Voice typing.
Providers| Capabilities| Word Error Rate  
---|---|---  
Provider| Transcription| Voice Commands| Email| Technical Report| Professional Notes| Lecture| Book  
Aqua Voice| Real-time| Natural Language| 0.9%| 1.0%| 1.4%| 4.4%| 0.7%  
Whisper-large-v3 + GPT4o| Async| Natural Language| 0.9%| 2.2%| 0.6%| 3.3%| 5.0%  
Wispr Flow| Async| Natural Language| 10.5%| 12.5%| 5.5%| 4.2%| 10.1%  
Whisper-large-v3 *| Async| N/A| 32.8%| 33.9%| 23.7%| 2.3%| 18.2%  
SuperWhisper| Async| N/A| 20.4%| 34.4%| 13.2%| 7.8%| 25.5%  
Rev| Async| N/A| 11.9%| 14.6%| 5.9%| 4.4%| 9.6%  
Otter| Async| N/A| 28.0%| 41.3%| 25.3%| 3.2%| 32.8%  
Apple Notes Dictation| Real-time| Hard-coded| 17.8%| 29.8%| 16.0%| 33.1%| 11.6%  
Google Voice Typing| Real-time| Hard-coded| 17.8%| 36.3%| 21.3%| 43.7%| 41.1%  
Dragon Dictation 16 Pro| Real-time| Hard-coded| 12.2%| 19.8%| 11.6%| 18.0%| 7.3%  
[Read more](https://withaqua.com/</blog/benchmark-nov-2024>)  
  * ‚Ä¢ Aqua Voice: 99.1% accuracy
  * ‚Ä¢ 17x fewer errors than Siri
  * ‚Ä¢ Real-time processing


[Read full comparison](https://withaqua.com/</blog/benchmark-nov-2024>)
## Auto Formatting
Aqua understands what you want. No custom commands needed.
Legal CitationsMedical NotesListsCorrectionsCommands
See Hawkins versus McGee eighty four New Hampshire one fourteen from nineteen twenty nine
See Hawkins v. McGee, 84 N.H. 114 (1929)
(Legal Citation Formatting)

It's your time to shine.

[@aquavoice_](https://withaqua.com/<https:/twitter.com/aquavoice_>) I just tried it for the first time - it's...wonderful. I am primarily a pen+paper note taker (and that'll continue) but sometimes I am looking to feed a concept to an LLM or a friend, and tend to ramble. Going back and fixing stuff naturally works astonishingly well.

## Pricing
Find the right plan for you.
### Free
Perfect for getting started
  * 1,000 free words
  * Basic voice commands
  * Standard support


### Pro - $10/month
For power users
  * Unlimited words
  * Advanced voice commands
  * Priority support
  * Early access to new features


## Get started for free
Try Aqua yourself. No credit card required.

### Aqua Voice: The Voice-Only Writing Revolution

**Overview:**
Founded in 2023 and hailing from San Francisco, Aqua Voice is a fresh addition to the tech landscape, emerging from Y Combinator's W24 batch. This spirited startup has a compact team of three, fueled by a bold mission: to redefine the text-editing experience through voice. 

**What They Do:**
Aqua Voice operates as a voice-driven text editor that empowers users to speak as they would normally. You don‚Äôt have to labor over commands or keywords; just talk to Aqua, and it‚Äôll translate your words into coherent text, precisely formatted to your specifications. Imagine telling it, "Write an email about next week's meeting," and it handles the rest.

**Core Features:**
- **High Accuracy:** The platform boasts a staggering 99.1% accuracy rate, outperforming other voice typing solutions like Siri or Google Voice‚Äîabout 17 times fewer mistakes.
- **Effortless Formatting:** Aqua intuitively understands the context and format you need, whether crafting legal documents or casual emails.
- **Universal Compatibility:** The technology seamlessly integrates with your favorite apps‚ÄîSlack, Notion, Discord, and more, enabling a smooth workflow no matter where you‚Äôre working.
  
**Use Cases:**
Aqua Voice is perfect for anyone who thinks out loud‚Äîwhether you‚Äôre a busy professional crafting reports, a student taking notes, or someone simply looking to get thoughts down faster. 

**Pricing:**
Aqua Voice opens its doors with a free tier that offers 1,000 words and basic functionality. For the avid user, a $10/month Pro plan provides unlimited words and advanced features, complete with priority support.

**Getting Started:**
Keen to try it out? Aqua Voice is ready for you, no credit card required. Just visit [their website](https://withaqua.com) to download the application for Windows or Mac.

**Backing and Community:**
With Michael Seibel as their Group Partner, Aqua isn‚Äôt just another startup; it‚Äôs part of a network that supports innovative solutions in tech. The early feedback from users highlights how it‚Äôs changing workflows, allowing them to capture thoughts organically and efficiently.

In essence, Aqua Voice isn‚Äôt just making writing easier; it's crafting a new narrative around how we interact with technology, one conversation at a time.
